title: Tech Management Info Session
description: Join us to learn more about Maryland Smith's unique Graduate Program in Technology Management .

title: Dean’s Distinguished Speaker Series
description: Upcoming in the Dean’s Distinguished Speaker Series, Dan Ives, managing partner and senior equity research analyst at Wedbush Securities and University of Maryland MBA alumnus, will discuss trends in the technology sector, including electric vehicles and disruptive technologies.

description: Explore the UMD Smith Part-Time Flex MBA and Online MBA programs in this virtual webinar.

title: Global Strategy Case Workshop
description: In collaboration with logistics, business and public policy professor Jon Crocker, this hands-on workshop will teach students how to strategize, analyze and best present global business cases in a competition environment.

title: Meet the Center at the Cybersecurity Association of Maryland Summit

title: Meet the OMSBA Academic Director
description: Join Academic Director Bharti Motwani for an insightful discussion about the Online MS in Business Analytics program. Don’t miss this chance to gain valuable insights into the program and connect with our admissions team.

title: Global Summer Internship Info Session
description: Learn about the Summer Global Internship program. Earn six credits while interning abroad this summer.

title: International Business Student Organization (IBSO) IB Trek
description: In collaboration with IBSO, visit companies with global operations and learn about international business concepts while exploring the Baltimore area. The trek will depart from and return to Van Munching Hall. Open to undergraduate and graduate students.

title: Mock Class: Exploring Marketing Data Science

title: BAM! – Why Exporting Is Great for Your Company
description: Join Rebecca Bellinger, executive director of the Center for Global Business, and partners of the MAPIT Alliance during Business, Advocacy, Mentorship (BAM!), an event of the Maryland Hispanic Chamber of Commerce.

title: Undergraduate Program at Shady Grove Information Session
description: Come learn more about admission to the Smith undergraduate program at the Universities at Shady Grove! You'll meet academic advisors and learn more about the programs, transfer process, and student experience at the Shady Grove campus. This session will be held virtually every other Friday.

title: Research in Industry Panel
description: How is research used in industry? Come learn from those who have this experience and explore potential career paths.

title: Master’s Students: Meet the Office of Career Services
description: Mystified by LinkedIn? Wondering what employers really want to see on your resume? Office of Career Services (OCS) can help! Smith Career Coach Seth Travers will walk you through the coaching process and how to effectively target your post-graduation employment goals.

title: MSSCM Mock Class: The role of Supply Chain Management

title: Flex & Online MBA Virtual Info Session
description: Explore the UMD Smith Part-Time Flex MBA and Online MBA programs in this virtual webinar. Learn how each option is designed to provide the rigor of a Smith MBA with the flexibility you need to balance work, life, and school.

title: World in Flux: Global Wildcards 2026-2031
description: Join the Center for Global Business and Erik Peterson, managing director of Kearney’s Global Business Policy Council, for a discussion on Kearney’s latest report, World in Flux: Global Wildcards 2026–2031 , as part of the Distinguished Speakers in International Business Series.
